frame.name: Unattributed_information
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Reported_fact</fen> is presented by the speaker as deriving from statements (made directly to them or to others) of third parties.
<ex>Four <t>purported</t> <fex name="rep">gang members</fex> could face death penalty in Virginia slaying of federal informant.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Reported_fact
FE.definition:
<def-root>An assertion of a state, event, property or existence or the assignment to a category that the speaker attributes to unnamed others.
<ex>Lester Hayes was <t>purportedly</t> <fex name="rep">joined in this suit by his wife</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The span of time for which the <fen>Reported_fact</fen> has been circulating. </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which or the apparant cause of the <fen>Reported_fact</fen>. </def-root>
